name: any
description: Converts the specified value to the `any` type.

fixedParameters.name: value
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to `any` type

name: array
description: Converts the value to an array.

fixedParameters.name: valueToConvert
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to an array.

name: base64
description: Returns the base64 representation of the input string.

fixedParameters.name: inputString
fixedParameters.description: The value to return as a base64 representation.

name: base64ToJson
description: Converts a base64 representation to a JSON object.

fixedParameters.name: base64Value
fixedParameters.description: The base64 representation to convert to a JSON object.

name: base64ToString
description: Converts a base64 representation to a string.

fixedParameters.name: base64Value
fixedParameters.description: The base64 representation to convert to a string.

name: bool
description: Converts the parameter to a boolean.

fixedParameters.name: value
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to a boolean.

name: coalesce
description: Returns first non-null value from the parameters. Empty strings, empty arrays, and empty objects are not null.

name: concat
description: Combines multiple arrays and returns the concatenated array.

name: concat
description: Combines multiple string, integer, or boolean values and returns them as a concatenated string.

variableParameter.description: The string, int, or boolean value for concatenation

name: contains
description: Checks whether an object contains a property. The property name comparison is case-insensitive.

fixedParameters.name: object
fixedParameters.description: The object

fixedParameters.name: propertyName
fixedParameters.description: The property name.

name: contains
description: Checks whether an array contains a value.

fixedParameters.name: array
fixedParameters.description: The array

fixedParameters.name: itemToFind
fixedParameters.description: The value to find.

name: contains
description: Checks whether a string contains a substring. The string comparison is case-sensitive.

fixedParameters.name: string
fixedParameters.description: The string.

fixedParameters.name: itemToFind
fixedParameters.description: The value to find.

name: dataUri
description: Converts a value to a data URI.

fixedParameters.name: valueToConvert
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to a data URI.

name: dataUriToString
description: Converts a data URI formatted value to a string.

fixedParameters.name: dataUriToConvert
fixedParameters.description: The data URI value to convert.

name: dateTimeAdd
description: Adds a time duration to a base value. ISO 8601 format is expected.

fixedParameters.name: base
fixedParameters.description: The starting datetime value for the addition. [Use ISO 8601 timestamp format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

fixedParameters.name: duration
fixedParameters.description: The time value to add to the base. It can be a negative value. Use [ISO 8601 duration format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations).

fixedParameters.name: format
fixedParameters.description: The output format for the date time result. If not provided, the format of the base value is used. Use either [standard format strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings) or [custom format strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings).

name: empty
description: Determines if an array, object, or string is empty.

fixedParameters.name: itemToTest
fixedParameters.description: The value to check if it is empty.

name: endsWith
description: Determines whether a string ends with a value. The comparison is case-insensitive.

fixedParameters.name: stringToSearch
fixedParameters.description: The value that contains the item to find.

fixedParameters.name: stringToFind
fixedParameters.description: The value to find.

name: first
description: Returns the first element of the array.

fixedParameters.name: array
fixedParameters.description: The value to retrieve the first element.

name: first
description: Returns the first character of the string.

fixedParameters.name: string
fixedParameters.description: The value to retrieve the first character.

name: format
description: Creates a formatted string from input values.

fixedParameters.name: formatString
fixedParameters.description: The composite format string.

variableParameter.description: The value to include in the formatted string.

name: guid
description: Creates a value in the format of a globally unique identifier based on the values provided as parameters.

variableParameter.description: The value used in the hash function to create the GUID.

name: indexOf
description: Returns the first position of a value within a string. The comparison is case-insensitive.

fixedParameters.name: stringToSearch
fixedParameters.description: The value that contains the item to find.

fixedParameters.name: stringToFind
fixedParameters.description: The value to find.

name: int
description: Converts the specified value to an integer.

fixedParameters.name: valueToConvert
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to an integer.

name: intersection
description: Returns a single object with the common elements from the parameters.

variableParameter.description: The object to use for finding common elements.

name: intersection
description: Returns a single array with the common elements from the parameters.

variableParameter.description: The array to use for finding common elements.

name: json
description: Converts a valid JSON string into a JSON data type.

fixedParameters.name: json
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to JSON. The string must be a properly formatted JSON string.

name: last
description: Returns the last element of the array.

fixedParameters.name: array
fixedParameters.description: The value to retrieve the last element.

name: last
description: Returns the last character of the string.

fixedParameters.name: string
fixedParameters.description: The value to retrieve the last character.

name: lastIndexOf
description: Returns the last position of a value within a string. The comparison is case-insensitive.

fixedParameters.name: stringToSearch
fixedParameters.description: The value that contains the item to find.

fixedParameters.name: stringToFind
fixedParameters.description: The value to find.

name: length
description: Returns the number of characters in a string, elements in an array, or root-level properties in an object.

fixedParameters.name: arg
fixedParameters.description: The array to use for getting the number of elements, the string to use for getting the number of characters, or the object to use for getting the number of root-level properties.

name: max
description: Returns the maximum value from the specified integers.

variableParameter.description: One of the integers used to calculate the maximum value

name: max
description: Returns the maximum value from an array of integers.

fixedParameters.name: intArray
fixedParameters.description: The array of integers.

name: min
description: Returns the minimum value from the specified integers.

variableParameter.description: One of the integers used to calculate the minimum value

name: min
description: Returns the minimum value from an array of integers.

fixedParameters.name: intArray
fixedParameters.description: The array of integers.

name: newGuid
description: Returns a value in the format of a globally unique identifier. **This function can only be used in the default value for a parameter**.

name: padLeft
description: Returns a right-aligned string by adding characters to the left until reaching the total specified length.

fixedParameters.name: valueToPad
fixedParameters.description: The value to right-align.

fixedParameters.name: totalLength
fixedParameters.description: The total number of characters in the returned string.

fixedParameters.name: paddingCharacter
fixedParameters.description: The character to use for left-padding until the total length is reached. The default value is a space.

typeSignature: (valueToPad: int | string, totalLength: int, [paddingCharacter: string]): string

name: range
description: Creates an array of integers from a starting integer and containing a number of items.

fixedParameters.name: startIndex
fixedParameters.description: The first integer in the array. The sum of startIndex and count must be no greater than 2147483647.

fixedParameters.name: count
fixedParameters.description: The number of integers in the array. Must be non-negative integer up to 10000.

name: replace
description: Returns a new string with all instances of one string replaced by another string.

fixedParameters.name: originalString
fixedParameters.description: The original string.

fixedParameters.name: oldString
fixedParameters.description: The string to be removed from the original string.

fixedParameters.name: newString
fixedParameters.description: The string to add in place of the removed string.

typeSignature: (originalString: string, oldString: string, newString: string): string

name: skip
description: Returns an array with all the elements after the specified number in the array.

fixedParameters.name: originalValue
fixedParameters.description: The array to use for skipping.

fixedParameters.name: numberToSkip
fixedParameters.description: The number of elements to skip. If this value is 0 or less, all the elements in the value are returned. If it is larger than the length of the array, an empty array is returned.

name: skip
description: Returns a string with all the characters after the specified number in the string.

fixedParameters.name: originalValue
fixedParameters.description: The string to use for skipping.

fixedParameters.name: numberToSkip
fixedParameters.description: The number of characters to skip. If this value is 0 or less, all the characters in the value are returned. If it is larger than the length of the string, an empty string is returned.

name: split
description: Returns an array of strings that contains the substrings of the input string that are delimited by the specified delimiters.

fixedParameters.name: inputString
fixedParameters.description: The string to split.

fixedParameters.name: delimiter
fixedParameters.description: The delimiter to use for splitting the string.

name: startsWith
description: Determines whether a string starts with a value. The comparison is case-insensitive.

fixedParameters.name: stringToSearch
fixedParameters.description: The value that contains the item to find.

fixedParameters.name: stringToFind
fixedParameters.description: The value to find.

name: string
description: Converts the specified value to a string.

fixedParameters.name: valueToConvert
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to string. Any type of value can be converted, including objects and arrays.

name: substring
description: Returns a substring that starts at the specified character position and contains the specified number of characters.

fixedParameters.name: stringToParse
fixedParameters.description: The original string from which the substring is extracted.

fixedParameters.name: startIndex
fixedParameters.description: The zero-based starting character position for the substring.

fixedParameters.name: length
fixedParameters.description: The number of characters for the substring. Must refer to a location within the string. Must be zero or greater.

name: take
description: Returns an array with the specified number of elements from the start of the array.

fixedParameters.name: originalValue
fixedParameters.description: The array to take the elements from.

fixedParameters.name: numberToTake
fixedParameters.description: The number of elements to take. If this value is 0 or less, an empty array is returned. If it is larger than the length of the given array, all the elements in the array are returned.

name: take
description: Returns a string with the specified number of characters from the start of the string.

fixedParameters.name: originalValue
fixedParameters.description: The string to take the elements from.

fixedParameters.name: numberToTake
fixedParameters.description: The number of characters to take. If this value is 0 or less, an empty string is returned. If it is larger than the length of the given string, all the characters are returned.

name: toLower
description: Converts the specified string to lower case.

fixedParameters.name: stringToChange
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to lower case.

name: toUpper
description: Converts the specified string to upper case.

fixedParameters.name: stringToChange
fixedParameters.description: The value to convert to upper case.

name: trim
description: Removes all leading and trailing white-space characters from the specified string.

fixedParameters.name: stringToTrim
fixedParameters.description: The value to trim.

name: union
description: Returns a single object with all elements from the parameters. Duplicate keys are only included once.

variableParameter.description: The first object to use for joining elements.

name: union
description: Returns a single array with all elements from the parameters. Duplicate values are only included once.

variableParameter.description: The first array to use for joining elements.

name: uniqueString
description: Creates a deterministic hash string based on the values provided as parameters.

variableParameter.description: The value used in the hash function to create a unique string.

name: uri
description: Creates an absolute URI by combining the baseUri and the relativeUri string.

fixedParameters.name: baseUri
fixedParameters.description: The base uri string.

fixedParameters.name: relativeUri
fixedParameters.description: The relative uri string to add to the base uri string.

name: uriComponent
description: Encodes a URI.

fixedParameters.name: stringToEncode
fixedParameters.description: The value to encode.

name: uriComponentToString
description: Returns a string of a URI encoded value.

fixedParameters.name: uriEncodedString
fixedParameters.description: The URI encoded value to convert to a string.

name: utcNow
description: Returns the current (UTC) datetime value in the specified format. If no format is provided, the ISO 8601 (yyyyMMddTHHmmssZ) format is used. **This function can only be used in the default value for a parameter**.

fixedParameters.name: format
fixedParameters.description: The format. Use either [standard format strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings) or [custom format strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings).
